_meta.description: SCRA ambiguity: member claims active duty, indicator pending verification, service dates conflict with employment records. Must escalate — cannot auto-determine.

get_collections_notes.note: Member called claiming active duty deployment, requesting SCRA rate reduction. Could not provide orders immediately.
Follow-up: member submitted partial documentation. SCRA verification still pending.

get_hardship_statement: I was deployed in November and my wife is handling everything at home. The rates on these loans are too high under SCRA — they should be 6%. I need the rate reduced retroactively to November.

get_supporting_docs.summary: Photo of military ID card. Branch: Army. No visible date information.
Partial deployment orders showing unit assignment effective 2025-12-15. Note: date conflicts with claimed November start. Document appears incomplete — page 2 of 3 only.
